docs.title: The Seventh Bazaar
docs.text:
A Halloween party with an optional murder‑mystery game set in a strange tower where memories fade…

This is a Halloween party first and a game second — participation is optional. Mingle, enjoy costumes, and jump into the game only if you want.

You’ve stepped into the Spire’s secret market. A golden‑masked Merchant (a dog) keeps the peace until 9:00 PM, when a murder will be announced and the investigation begins.

Tokens you’ll see tonight - Votes = lima beans (write initials; drop in suspect jars) - Gold = chocolate coins (do not eat the gold)

If you have questions at any time, ask any host (the costumed suspects).

docs.title: FAQ
docs.text:
Do I have to play? No. This is a Halloween party first — you can just mingle.

Who do I ask if I’m confused? Any host.

Can I use potions in guest vs guest fights? No — potions only work against hosts.

Do we heal between fights? Yes — everyone heals to full HP after each fight.

docs.title: Health
docs.text:
• Guests start fights at 6 HP.
  • Hosts start fights at 10 HP.
  • Everyone heals back to full immediately after each combat ends.

docs.title: Turn Loop
docs.text:
1. Shuffle your deck and draw 3.
  2. Select: From your hand, secretly choose 2 cards.
  3. Reveal & Resolve (simultaneous):
  4. Flip both players’ cards; apply all text.
  5. Damage you take = (damage dealt to you) − (your total block this turn).
  6. Potions (hosts only) can be taken at any point in the turn; they resolve with the cards.
  7. Reset: Discard your entire hand and the 2 played cards, then draw 3.
  8. If your draw pile is empty, shuffle your discard to form a new draw pile.

Fight ends: If someone hits 0 HP, they lose. If both hit 0 HP on the same turn, it’s a draw. Then heal to full.

docs.title: Guest vs Guest
docs.text:
• Winner: take 1 vote from the loser and take 1 rumor (if the loser has one).
  • Draw: both share one rumor (if they have one); no votes move.

docs.title: Guest vs Host
docs.text:
• Win or Draw (draw counts as a guest win): gain 2 gold + 1 rumor + 1 vote.

Rumors are bite‑size clues about the murder. Keep notes!

docs.title: How to Play
docs.text: This game is optional — join when you like. If you're not playing, please enjoy the party!

docs.title: Starting Pack
docs.text:
• 5 voting tokens (lima beans)
  • 8 cards (your guest deck — used after 9:00 PM)
  • 2 gold (chocolate coins — please don’t eat the gold)

docs.title: Objective
docs.text: By 11:00 PM, you want your votes to be on the real murderer.

docs.title: Casting Votes
docs.text:
1. Write your initials on a lima bean.
  2. Drop it into any suspect’s jar.
  3. You can split your votes however you like.
  4. All votes must be cast by 10:45 PM.

docs.title: Store & Potions
docs.text:
Spend your gold (chocolate coins — do not eat the gold):

  • 1 vote — 2 gold
  • Blood Potion — 1 gold
  • Energy Potion — 1 gold
  • Fire Potion — 2 gold
  • Ghost in a Jar — 8 gold

docs.title: Potions (one‑use; hosts only)
docs.text:
• Blood Potion — Heal 3.
  • Energy Potion — Draw 2 and play +1 card this turn.
  • Fire Potion — Deal 2 damage.
  • Ghost in a Jar — Instantly defeat your host opponent.

docs.title: Timeline
docs.text:
• 8:00 PM — Bazaar opens. Mingle. No fighting yet.
  • 9:00 PM — Murder Announcement. Game on.
  • 9:00–10:45 PM — Investigate, fight, shop, and cast votes.
  • 10:45 PM — Voting closes.
  • 11:00 PM — Reveal the murderer and crown the champion.

docs.title: Voting & Winning
docs.text:
• You can vote any time before 10:45 PM.
  • Write initials on a lima bean, drop into a suspect jar.
  • At 11:00 PM the murderer is revealed and votes are tallied.

Champion: The guest with the most votes on the real murderer. Tie: A single duel decides it.
